ygData.subject: Re: Quick Change of Weapons

ygData.messageBody:
i read about this in the gamespot online manual when i started playin i
think.cant remember how though.sorri

> Entreri wrote:
>
> Hail,
> Is it possible to switch weapons instantly w/o going into inventory?As
> I am a bard,I need to switch from a weapon to a musical weapon or vice
> versa instantly.For example,this group of orcs might be hard to kill
> then I join the party to attack orc but the whole team seems to be
> losing so I need to switch to a drum and use speed song to get through
> but time is precious is this typa situation so any ideas to recommend
> if its not possible to switch weapon immediately?
>
>
>
